com.psddev.cms.db

Class FieldAccessFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.util.AbstractFilter
      • com.psddev.cms.db.FieldAccessFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter

    public class FieldAccessFilter
extends com.psddev.dari.util.AbstractFilter
    Internal filter that adds <span data-field> to the response whenever an object field is accessed.

        @Deprecated
public static String createMarkerHtml(com.psddev.dari.db.State state,
                                 String name)
        Deprecated. Use FieldAccessFilter.Static.createMarkerHtml(com.psddev.dari.db.State, java.lang.String) instead.
        Creates the marker HTML that identifies access to a field with the given name in the given state.
